about_the_game:
COSMIC HOLES is a logic puzzle game based on the 5 elements of Chinese cosmology: Wood, Fire, Earth, Metal, and Water.




Here's a quick look at the relationships between these elements:
  • Water, in blue, feeds Wood, in green. We can see that the Wood element turns fast in this case.

  • Water extinguishes Fire. We see that the Fire element, in red, turns slowly in this case.

  • Wood feeds Fire. But Water always extinguishes Fire. We see that the Fire element turns at a medium speed in this case.

Characteristics


  • A relaxed atmosphere in a space universe.
  • Hundreds of logic puzzles of all levels of difficulty.
  • Laws governing the 5 elements of traditional Chinese medicine.
  • 4 logical rules to discover and respect to get out of each puzzle (see the Guide).
  • A little story around the main character, the little green one.

And for those who are too strong:
  • An environment that will be able to defend itself.
  • A challenge for the different areas of your brain that will have to cooperate a lot.
  • A dedicated area to congratulate you on your prowess.


COSMIC HOLES: strangely relaxing and explosive at the same time!

COSMIC HOLES is a logic puzzle game based on the 5 elements of Chinese cosmology: Wood, Fire, Earth, Metal, and Water.




Here's a quick look at the relationships between these elements:
  • Water, in blue, feeds Wood, in green. We can see that the Wood element turns fast in this case.

  • Water extinguishes Fire. We see that the Fire element, in red, turns slowly in this case.

  • Wood feeds Fire. But Water always extinguishes Fire. We see that the Fire element turns at a medium speed in this case.

Characteristics


  • A relaxed atmosphere in a space universe.
  • Hundreds of logic puzzles of all levels of difficulty.
  • Laws governing the 5 elements of traditional Chinese medicine.
  • 4 logical rules to discover and respect to get out of each puzzle (see the Guide).
  • A little story around the main character, the little green one.

And for those who are too strong:

  • A challenge for the different areas of your brain that will have to cooperate a lot.
  • A dedicated area to congratulate you on your prowess.


COSMIC HOLES: strangely relaxing and explosive at the same time!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: 2 GHz | 64-bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better Display

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better. Not supported: macOS Big Sur 11.0 and later.
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better Display

name: COSMIC HOLES

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x720 or better Display

reviews:
“Challenge yourself with hundreds of logic puzzles based on Chinese cosmology. Discover the 5 elements and solve the puzzles in a relaxing space universe.”
RECOMMENDED – KeyHub

“COSMIC HOLES offers you a motivating learning curve in chinese cosmology.”
RECOMMENDED – Adult World Gamers

“A game in distant space, fill the holes with 5 elements to complete the level. Move the elements with the green figurine, but choose wisely - the wrong choice will cause an explosion.”
RECOMMENDED – GooD-PaRaZiT
short_description: COSMIC HOLES is a logic puzzle game based on the 5 elements of Chinese cosmology: Wood, Fire, Earth, Metal, and Water. Solve and maintain the balance of the elements in an environment that adapts to your own energy. Relaxing and explosive!
